Header: RO Commissioned to Provide Purified Drinking Water for 65 Div Troops
Content: A Reverse Osmosis (RO) plant for purification of drinking water for troops in the 65 Division Headquarters in Thunukkai was inaugurated on Tuesday (29). Installation of the RO plant fulfilled a long-felt need at the 65 Division since it would have a great impact to prevent Chronic Kidney Diseases (CKD) for troops serving in this area. The RO plant has a capacity to provide 5000 liters per day and the General Officer Commanding 65 Division, Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma commissioned the plant during a brief ceremony. Further, arrangements have been made to provide drinking water facility to nearby 653 Brigade and 10 Sri Lanka Light Infantry troops from the same RO plant.
